General.Name: Micromem Technologies Inc
General.Description: Micromem Technologies Inc. designs, develops, and provides customized sensor applications based on its proprietary technology in Canada and internationally. Its products are used for various applications in oil sensor solutions, structural integrity sensors, nanoparticle detection solution, and energy storage solutions. The company was formerly known as Avanti Corp International Inc. and changed its name to Micromem Technologies Inc. in January 1999. Micromem Technologies Inc. was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 121 Richmond Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 2K1
